title: Increase upload size limit for blog media
scope: Configure Flask MAX_CONTENT_LENGTH to support larger media uploads
Allow size to be configured via environment variable
Record the update in the changelog
acceptance_criteria: Flask app enforces an increased upload size limit (default 50MB)
Upload limit can be overridden with an environment variable
CHANGELOG.md includes an entry for this work order
risk_notes: Large uploads could increase memory usage during request processing
rollback_plan: Remove MAX_CONTENT_LENGTH configuration or lower its default value
